phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
Statement, Witness 1, Year 2 Class C, H-To K-ji
Statement, Witness 2, Year 2 Class C, K-hara M-ya
Statement, Witness 3, Year 2 Class C, N-to H-mitsu
Statement, Witness 4, Year 2 Class C, K-shii N-nako
What the hell am I doing?!
How did you end up eating breakfast at our place?!
Why are not you bothered by it?
Since Taiga-chan is so small, she takes up so little space.
Besides, it tastes even better when everyone eats together.
How much do you intend to eat?!
Seriously, are you trying to make your pet moult from stress?
Do not let it get any uglier.
In truth, pets are similar to their owners.
I made you breakfast and prepared a lunch box!
Aisaka Taiga has been a frequent guest at our dinner table.
once we get to school, make sure that you properly...
You promised me you would work like a dog for me, after all!
If things seem to take a bad turn...
Good to see you are perky today as well!
I am so sorry, I had no idea that Taiga and Takasu-kun...
You have got it all wr -
You know, people do not use companioned like that these days.
Egads, I do not know what they call it these days!
I am telling you, that is not it!
I just happened to stumble upon Aisaka over there.
Oh, so it was just a coincidence?
Apparently we live close to each other.
Yesterday, I was watching TV and...
In order to get closer to Kushieda,
I will first have to mediate between Aisaka and Kitamura.
And that is it for shooting practice.
Yes, let us pair up, Takasu-kun!
Takasu and Aisaka, you two are really fired up.
Is it that kind of day today?
I will lightly hit Kitamura's partner with the ball,
So, Aisaka and Kitamura will lose their partners and pair up instead.
Who will want to team up with Haruto-kun today?!
K-Kitamura-kun's pairing up with that weirdo!
Events have taken a turn for the weir -
It does not matter what gender his partner is.
And the swelling bulges drawn in the Jouan era...
I will throw the ball without using my thumbs!
That did not reach me, Kushieda.
The road to understanding the Satoru-ball is steep.
Do not mind me, it is not something just anyone would know.
No, really, that was very good.
But hitting a girl with the ball...
The Palmtop Tiger got taken down by Takasu-kun!
The Palmtop Tiger snarls at whoever's around.
Even so, she tries so hard that she makes a fool of herself,
so you just end up wanting to help her.
Listen up, you have to hand them over casually.
If you are looking for Kitamura,
he said he had some business over at building B or some -
He just left, so he might be that wa -
At that speed, she will catch him -
I might just be a klutz.
She was not aware of that already?
If I write a love letter, I end up putting it in the wrong bag.
If I try to invade a house, I fall over from hunger.
If I play basketball, I get a ball right in the face.
If I try to hand over some cookies, I fall down the stairs,
Like forgetting to put the love letter inside the envelope.
Wait, they were smashed into pieces...
They came out okay, did not they?
Let us try harder next time.
They were buying things like spring onions and radishes at the supermarket.
They left the same apartment building together with naughty looks on their faces.
Also, they were feeding each other home-made cookies saying, Here, open up!
What is up with your best friend?
Please take good care of Taiga!
Taiga is my dearest best friend!
So that is how it was.
What are you doing up there?
I was wondering why you were together so often,
but now that I think about it, you two fit together so well!
Minorin misunderstood everything because I was intruding at your house.
You see, I struggled so much with my parents that when I said I wanted to leave,
they simply gave me that apartment.
I knew they were those kind of parents, but...
The cookies were salty, were not they?
I was frustrated when I found them in pieces, so I ate some.
Yet you ate all of them.
You even lied about their taste.
Even if you are a mongrel, your fur will she would if you keep being so nice to everyone.
Hey, do you also feel frustrated when you think about Minori?
Why does not anyone understand us?
Even when we are so troubled, why does not anyone support us?
I am not okay with being that at all!
Why will not you listen to me?!
Even Mum, even Dad, no one...
Do you have a problem with me being small?!
Stop calling me a delinquent just because of my appearance!
Do you have a problem with us being together in front of everyone?!
I am sorry for having evil-looking eyes!
Hey Ryuuji, is not this pole tilted now?
Tomorrow, I will confess to Kitamura-kun.
It will all be over then.
Your services as a dog will be over.
As of tomorrow, we are just classmates who live close to each other.
And that is all there is to it.
Are not we having breakfast really early today?
We spread all those weird rumours...
There is nothing between me and Ryuuji.
Saying you are not a delinquent, making a huge mess...
She really is scary, that Palmtop Tiger.
But I said that Takasu is not as scary as he looks, right?
More importantly, If we do not clean this up, will not we be in trouble?
I am absolutely not going out with Takasu-kun.
So this is all a misunderstanding.
She especially wanted me to be aware of this...
And she had this kind of desperate, serious look about her.
What does she think she is doing?
Were not you going to confess to Kitamura today?!
This is not the time to be worrying about me!
As of tomorrow, we are just classmates who live close to each other.
And that is all there is to it.
And that is all there is to it?
Why are you doing it right after arriving at school?
If things do not turn out well, this will be one hell of a bad day, you know.
I think I know how this conversation's going to end.
But before that, I would like to confirm something.
That was just Minorin misunderstanding things!
So you do not like him?
Our houses just happen to be close to each other.
It has nothing to do with me liking him or not.
But it is not about that!
Ryuuji made me delicious fried rice!
He even lied to make me feel better...
Because Ryuuji was there, because he was supporting me...
Because of that, I am able to stand here like this!
I am in love with you, Kitamura-kun!
It is okay, I think your feelings were properly relayed.
Do you recall one year ago.
Unlike that time, you now have this...
Yeah, when you are around Takasu, you have this funny-looking face.
and you thinking of him like you did earlier...
But I am relieved you are on such good terms with Takasu.
Ryuuji does not have anything to do -
My feet, what about my feet?
Was I able to tell you I love you?
It is going to be okay, Aisaka.
W-What is going to be okay?!
You have not understood what I was saying!
From now on, I am sure we will be great friends.
Like I am saying, not friends, I was confess -
Oops, we will be late for homeroom.
I thought you were going to start crying.
D-Did you see all of it?
I did, but I did not mean to...
But what are you going to do?
You have not had breakfast, have you?
And did you even eat last night?
I am sure you went to the convenie -
If you do that, people will start misunderstanding again.
I told you you do not have to do this any more!
I do not get it either,
but I cannot leave you alone!
I am telling you it is enough already!
You are no longer my dog!
Yes, I am not a dog.
So, I am able to be by your side!
Since the ancient times, the dragon has been the only beast that could stand equal with a tiger.
And thus, as a dragon, I will be able to stay by your side, tiger.
There is a limit to how impudent you can be!
And we are going to make a new plan.
I am not going to give up on Kitamura-kun after just this.
It does not matter whether you are a dog or a dragon...
Since you said you would be at my side, you better work hard, Ryuuji.
Did I decide on this too quickly...?
Who always shines so brightly with joy!
